data.eml:eml: Two new species of Podonomus (Diptera: Chironomidae: Podonominae) of the Brundin’s decarthrus group from Ventania system, Argentina

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Siri, Augusto, Donato, Mariano (2012): Two new species of Podonomus (Diptera: Chironomidae: Podonominae) of the Brundin’s decarthrus group from Ventania system, Argentina. Zootaxa 3548: 39-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211158
